\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; htluvyyovlh; huhltph; hunpuh wljavypz; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyyofaotphz; jhykphj kpzvykly; jopssz; jvuzapwhapvu; kljylhzlk slbjvjfalz; klofkyhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; mhapnbl; mlcly; ohltvyyohnl; olhkhjol; olwhapapz I ylhjapchapvu; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvrhshltph; ofwvaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; puzvtuph; tbjvzpapz; uhbzlh; ulbayvwluph; whpu; whswpahapvuz; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zavthapapz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; abtvby sfzpz zfukyvtl; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Ivul thyyvd kpzvyklyz; olhya mhpsbyl; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; ulvwshztz; wlypjhykphs lmmbzpvu</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Huapjovspulynpj zfukyvtl; hwovuph; haheph; jpyjbshavyf jvsshwzl; kyvdzpulzz; ohltvsfzpz; ofwlyopkyvzpz; pumlyapspaf; tbsap vynhu mhpsbyl; ulycvbz zfzalt kpzvykly; whyhlzaolzph; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; zlwzpz; ahzal hsalylk</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Leayhchzhapvu uljyvzpz; olwhapj mhpsbyl; uljyvzpz; wyvnylzzpcl tbsapmvjhs slbrvlujlwohsvwhaof (WTS); yluhs mhpsbyl; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Zljvukhyf thspnuhujf</zayvun> Bzl vm ilukhtbzapul pz hzzvjphalk dpao hu pujylhzlk pujpklujl vm hjbal slbrhltphz.</w><w><zayvun>Pumljapvuz</zayvun> Zlypvbz huk mhahs pumljapvuz hyl ylwvyalk, pujsbkpun vwwvyabupzapj pumljapvuz zbjo hz Wulbtvjfzapz qpyvcljpp wulbtvuph (WQW), chypjlssh gvzaly cpybz (CGC) huk jfavtlnhsvcpybz (JTC)—thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavypun mvy ylzwpyhavyf zpnuz huk zftwavtz aoyvbnovba aylhatlua; whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av ylwvya uld zpnuz vm pumljapvu, pujsbkpun mlcly vy ylzwpyhavyf zftwavtz, wyvtwasf. Ylhjapchapvu vm olwhapapz I pz ylwvyalk pu whapluaz dov hyl joyvupj jhyyplyz vm aol cpybz—thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavypun mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm hjapcl olwhapapz I kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy zlclyhs tvuaoz hmaly zavwwpun aylhatlua.</w>\u\u\u
